function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Failure to rally support for transformative actions towards addressing threats like climate change","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of disclosure of competing financial interests or personal relationships","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of conclusive research on urban design and environmental factors","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Context-specific impacts of the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for ongoing reviews and updates in pandemic research","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The pandemic has exposed old socioeconomic inequalities that exist in cities, threatening public health by making it difficult to enforce protective measures such as social distancing.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public transportation has been severely affected during the pandemic, leading to increased use of private vehicles as a safer alternative and potentially posing threats to achieving sustainable development.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic impact on urban areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imbalanced coverage of major impact themes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in impact and response mechanisms across contexts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of empirical evidence on the effects of urban design on covid-19 spread","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Debate on the link between covid-19 prevalence and urban design characteristics","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Advocacy for compact urban development without clear evidence on its impact on disease spread","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased density enabling transmission of infectious diseases","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to resources in peri-urban and suburban areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Connectivity as a risk factor for disease spread","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconclusive evidence on the association between population density and covid-19 transmission rates","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive relationship between population density and covid-19 transmission rates in high-density areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative relationship between population density and covid-19 transmission rates in certain phases of the epidemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconclusive evidence on the association between urban density and covid-19 spread","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contradictory findings on the influence of urban form and design on pandemic dynamics","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in the relationship between population density and covid-19 spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Smart mobility restrictions may not be effectively implemented, leading to continued spread of the virus through transportation modes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative attitudes towards public transport may persist, leading to decreased usage and increased reliance on private vehicles.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased negative attitudes towards public transportation and preference for individual travel modes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased investment in suburban developments and reliance on private vehicles","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detrimental impact on well-being and health due to reduced physical activity and social isolation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 attributed to chinese new year, connecting flights, and rail connectivity.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Association between frequency of air flights and high-speed rail services and number of infected people in destination cities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate surveillance and monitoring of the population leading to unchecked spread of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of communication and assurance regarding the use of collected data for communal benefit","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Accessibility and affordability issues with smart solutions leading to digital divide","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Smart technologies used for top-down pandemic containment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of transparency and ethical use of smart technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access and usage of smart technologies in different social and political contexts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on smart city technologies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data privacy and security risks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disparities in access to smart technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The potential exploitation of urban-rural relationships leading to adverse events","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decline in tax base of cities encouraging engagement in collaboration networks of cities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on smart solutions and icts for urban operations and quality of life improvement","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of trust in government initiatives","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure of state-centric initiatives","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fragmented urban governance","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conflicting priorities of different government leading to conflicting priorities in containing virus spread","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited local independence and high reliance on central government for coordination","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proactive planning and emergency plans in bangladesh","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Absence of economic and social support for poor, disadvantaged, and vulnerable groups","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
